Modest Mouse – “Lampshades on Fire”

posted by Graham on December 15, 2014 in Audio

Image via Epic

Just days after announcing their first release in nearly six years, indie rock legends Modest Mouse have shared a lead single. It’s called “Lampshades on Fire,” and you can listen to it here.

This new single showcases a bit of something old (lead singer Isaac Brock’s signature twang and a small army of determined guitars), and a bit of something new (polished production and doo-wop harmonies on the chorus). Fans of the band’s early work, rest easy: many of the elements that made Modest Mouse great are still intact.

The album, Strangers To Ourselves, will be released March 3. It’s the band’s sixth studio album.

Tags:  modest mouse
